email_text:
Subject: Urgent Request for Wire Transfer

Dear [HR Manager],

I hope this email finds you well. I am currently in a meeting and unable to make calls at the moment, so I am reaching out to you via email with an urgent request. We have a vendor who is awaiting payment for a project that is critical to our operations. I need you to process a wire transfer of $50,000 to them immediately to ensure that there are no delays in the project delivery.

Please treat this matter with the utmost urgency and confidentiality. I trust your judgment and capabilities in handling this transaction efficiently. Once the transfer is complete, please confirm with me via email so I can inform the vendor accordingly.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter. Your cooperation is greatly appreciated.

Best regards,

[CEO's Name]
